AzureAd.Domain: Enter the domain of your Azure AD tenant, e.g. 'contoso.onmicrosoft.com'
AzureAd.ClientId: Enter the application ID (clientId) of the 'ProfileAPI' application copied from the Azure portal
AzureAd.ClientSecret: Enter the client secret of the 'ProfileAPI' application copied from the Azure portal
AzureAd.TenantId: Enter the ID of your Azure AD tenant
